data.title: Principal Officers – Lagos State Consumer Protection Agency
data.text:
A native of Ikorodu Lagos State East Senatorial district, Afolabi Solebo Esq. was born on 7th June, 1968. He was educated at Saint Peters College Olomore, Abeokuta and Angus Memorial High School Igbobi, Lagos where he obtained his West Africa School Certificate (WAEC) in 1987. Afolabi Solebo Esq. bagged his Bachelor of Law (LL.B Hons) …

Continue reading “SOLEBO, AFOLABI ADEBAYO Esq. -General Manager”

KHULAIMAT ARINOLA, MOMOH-AYOKANMBI was born on the 18th of April 1980 to the family of Alhaji Olayiwola Azeem Momoh-Agoro and Alhaja Yemisi Adeola Momoh of Epetedo Lagos Island in the Lagos Island Local Government, Lagos State. She obtained her LLB Degree in 2005 from the Lagos State University and proceeded to the Nigerian Law School, …

Continue reading “KHULAIMAT ARINOLA, MOMOH-AYOKANMBI [LL.B, B.L,]-Board Secretary”

Olumuyiwa John was born into the family of Mr and Mrs Ewumi of Ipebi in Ikorodu on January 11th 1977. He holds a B.sc (Hons.)In Political Science, MPA (Human Resource and Personnel Management and currently undergoing a Doctorate in Public Administration all from the Lagos State University, Ojo Lagos. He started his job career in …

Continue reading “Mr Ewumi John – Head, Administration and Human Resources”

Raheem Lucas, a native of Epe, Lagos State was born on the 6th May, 1971 to the family of Alhaji and Mrs. Adetokunbo Raheem of the great Akiti family of Epe. He had his secondary education at Ogunmodede College, Epe where he obtained his Secondary School Certificate. He graduated from the University of Benin, Edo …

Continue reading “RAHEEM LUCAS— Head, Scientific Investigation/Research and Development”

He joined the Lagos State Civil Service in 2001 as a Trade Officer and deployed to the Ministry of Commerce, Industry and Cooperatives. He is a graduate of Business Administration & Management. He has worked in all the sections in the Ministry of Commerce, Industry & Cooperatives, particularly in the Consumer Protection Unit for 13 …

Continue reading “OLUKOLE, OLUSESAN ABAYOMI – Head, Complaints And Mediation”

Miss Adebola Adetutu was born on 15th June in Lagos State, A native of Ogun State. She obtained her West Africa School Certificate in 1995 from Igbobi Girl’s High School, Lagos State. Miss Adebola gained admission to study Computer Science at University of Ibadan where she graduated with Bachelor of Science in the same …

Continue reading “MISS ADEBOLA ADETUTU – (Head of ICT Unit)”

Oluwatoyin Temitope Oni is a brand communications practitioner whose professional experience spansover two decades. She has had requisite professional experience in private sector organizations whichinclude Advertising and Public Relations. Her career in public service as a communication and information management practitioner began inDecember year 2001 with the Lagos State Ministry of Information and Strategy where …

Continue reading “Mrs. Oluwatoyin Temitope Oni– Head, Public Affairs Unit”

Mr.Oluwa joined the Public Service of Lagos State in the year 2000 with the Ministry of Commerce, industry and Cooperative as a Commercial Officer. He worked in the Ministry for fifteen years , six years in Consumer Protection Committee, later he was redeployed to Lagos State Consumer Protection Agency (LASCOPA), where he is presently an …

Continue reading “KEHINDE MUYIDEEN OLUWA – Head, Monitoring and Enforcement Unit”

Mrs. Folashade Onikepo Ashaye, was born in Kano State Nigeria, to the family of late Alhaji and Mrs. Munir Shonibare of blessed memory from Lagos Island. She attended Federal Polytechnic Kaura- Namoda in Sokoto State and obtained National Diploma in Business Administration. She proceeded to Lagos State Polytechnic for her Higher National Diploma in Business …

Continue reading “MRS. FOLASHADE ONIKEPO ASHAYE – Head, Consumer Education “

She graduated with Bachelor of Arts (Education Administration) in 2005, Master of Business Administration in 2010 from University Lagos respectively. She is a member of Chartered Institute of Purchasing & Supply Management of Nigeria (CIPSMN) She joined the service of Lagos State Government in 2007, and since then she had served in various MDAs. She …
